MWUC_DETAILS.SHIPCOMMENT: M/E is working in order.Maintenance carried out as per RH and PMS. Done No 6 unit overhaul on 07.10.15 . Exchanged ME Exhaust valve no 2 & 4 with stand by spare on 06.10.15. Exchangeed fuel valves 1,2,4, 5 & 7 units due RH on 07.10.15
MWUC_DETAILS.OFFICECOMMENT: Noted and pls update in PMS.

MWUC_DETAILS.SHIPCOMMENT: Aux; generators and performance are good in order. maintenance carried out as PMS & RH. To overhaul AE 2 Fuel injection pumps as per RH. (Dep. USA) No 1 AE turbocharger to be overhaul (Kit 2) as RH. (Dep. USA)

E/R pumps performance are satisfactory. Maintenance was done as per PMS. All Stand-by pumps are good in order. Changed over service monthly basic. All compressors and purifiers are operational. All heat exchanger performance are satisfactory.
Boiler performance was satisfactory. EGE steam production is satisfactory. Boiler water condition(Chloride, alkalinity) within normal. To clean EGB at USA last port.
All cargo pumps are working in order except COT 1P. Noted Vibration appear at HYD system while COT 1P operation.
MWUC_DETAILS.OFFICECOMMENT: Noted and pls provide more feedback on COT 1P vibration issue in details.

MWUC_DETAILS.SHIPCOMMENT: Windlass & mooring winches are working in order. No oil leakage. Cargo handling crane & provision crane are working in order. Power pack HYD system is working in order.
Electrical installation are regular maintenance as per PMS. No deficiency in this time. Free of earth fault at 110/440 system.
COT monitoring and alarm system are working in order. E/R alarm & monitoring system are good in order. Tested as per schedule.
General appearance of hull is good. Draft marks are clear visual. All main deck and super structure cleaning & painting in progress
MWUC_DETAILS.OFFICECOMMENT: Noted and pls update us along with pictures

MWUC_DETAILS.SHIPCOMMENT: Accommodation regular cleaning and painting as necessary. Acc: air con performance is satisfactory
Steering system are good working condition. Exchanged no 1 steering gear base of solenoid valveO' ring on 28.10.2015. But slight oil leakage was not stop.
MWUC_DETAILS.OFFICECOMMENT: Noted, Pls revert with RFQ for required spare parts to sort out this issue.

MWUC_DETAILS.SHIPCOMMENT: All communication equipment are working in order.Quarterly Communication test was done on 18th Sept 2015, E.mail/Voice/Sat C/SSAS test had been conducted.VDR down load exercise was done on 21st Sept 15.
Navigation equipments are working in order.

Emergency generator is working in order. (Last test 10.Oct.2015) Emergency fire pump is working in order. (Last test on 10.Oct.2015) Emergency steering is working in order. (Last test with 08.Oct.2015) Emergency lighting is working in order. (Last test on 10.Oct.2015) LSA and FFE are good condition and working in order.( Checked and test by service at CALLAO 13/june/2015) Regular inspection and check are carried out as per schedule. Lifeboat hook latch ease up (17/Aug/2015) RFQ sent for Parachutes to be supplied at Charleston VDR, We have renewed 6 out of 12 batteries recently.RFQ raised for 6 more batteries. VDR at present functioning normal. USCG COC Annual examination was conducted in Charleston on 29th Sept'15.Rescue boat was launched onto water and engine/sprinkler tested by USCG.Emergency fire pump tested with two fire hoses. Two Foam Tarrets have been tested with sea water running and reaching overboard.

Weekly test of 15ppm Alarm and function test of 3-way valve, Solenoid valve 1 & 2. Found operational. Last tested (10.Oct.2015) Opened, Checked OWS and renewed Coalescer filter (19.09.15) Incinerator is in normal working condition. Alarm tested with on 26.Sep.2015. Fan motor bearing was renewed due notice noise. (09.Oct.15) ODM; Onboard function test carried out on 09/Oct/2015 . Test and calibration by Altis Calserv Pte.Ltd. at Singapore@ 30.05.2013 Sewage plant; Opertional and maintenance as per schedule. Bilge wells and bilge tank are clean condition.
Boiler performance was satisfactory. Done chemical dosed at regular intervals and maintained the record daily. Tested alarms and trip (27.09.15) Daily inspected water level indicator.
AE 1 Turbocharger. (service kit 2) To be done departure USA.
Fixed Deck Foam Fire Exting System. HP Breathing Air Compressor. UTI Closed Sampler Tape.
MWUC_DETAILS.OFFICECOMMENT: Noted, Pls clarify on these defects in details, understand foam monitor valves already repaired?
